item.title: National Geographic Photo of the day Downloader for Linux
item.description: National Geographic's Photo Of the Day I am a fan of National Geographic photos on their site, and I also get bored of by my desktop background after a while. So I decided to create a script to download National Geographic photo of the day, and using it as my desktop background. I am using it over Gnome3 (I am using Fedora as I think itâ€™s more stable than Ubuntu, and I like Gnome3 way better than Unity), but if you are a Unity user it should work for you as well.
